ygData.subject: Re: crossroads of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: There was some trouble with their host at warzone. The new domain is www.xrgaming.net as warzone decided to keep xrgn.com, being mean pricks :P They had some
ygData.messageBody:
There was some trouble with their host at warzone. The new domain is
www.xrgaming.net as warzone decided to keep xrgn.com, being mean pricks :P

They had some trouble getting started again, but they are working on it. If
they are not done yet, there should be a temp info page at
www.crossroads-network.com

TS
